text: Let A is a diagonal matrix of order 49 and diis diagonal element of A. Given that 2i+1; ifimod3=0 di=<{i+3; ifimod3=1;where1<i<49 0; ifimod3 =2 Then which of the following statement is/are False? (a) The sum of the eigenvalues of A is 1308. (b) A is invertible. (c) Rank of A2= Rank of A. (d) A has 49 linearly independent eigenvectors.
